data.title: Report a Wi-Fi Problem
data.body:
If you are having an issue connecting to any of the Carleton College Wi-Fi networks, please tap the button below.

This information is anonymous, and we do not collect your username. We will record your current location and some general information about the device you are using, then share it with ITS.

data.title: Open a Helpdesk Ticket
data.body:
> If there’s something strange
> in your neighborhood
> Who you gonna call?

If you need help with general computing issues, please contact ITS.

Helpdesk requests are often related to accounts and passwords, classroom technologies, equipment checkout, Gmail migration, printer setup, network folder access, and network registration and connectivity, but are by no means limited to the aforementioned categories.

params.body:
Thank you for contacting the ITS Helpdesk!

Please include your name and a description of your problem.

Have a wonderful day!

data.title: Contact Facilities
data.body:
> Wild squirrels? Broken stairs? Missing doorframes?

> They're here to help!

Facilities "[…] provides and maintains a high-quality, clean, and safe environment that supports and enhances the residential liberal arts college experience."

Please be prepared to clearly explain the problem and where it is located in the box labeled “Description,” with a building name and room number or reference point. Let them know the time of the report, who you are, and how you can be reached.

You must be on Carleton's WiFi for the form to work.

data.title: Have an App Question?
data.body: If you've got a question about the app, or a new feature idea, let us know!

params.subject: A Thing
params.body:
Idea? Question? Comment? Concern?

Let us know!
